span.div: 1. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2020 (budget year) $50,473
2. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2019 (prior year) $48,149
3. Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year $2,324

Comments on average salary calculation (Optional): Calculation is for classroom teachers only and includes 301 pay, stipends, and other extra pay coded to 1000 function. Percentage increase is not done on stipends and extra pay.
5. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2018 $45,020
6. Total percentage increase in average teacher salary since FY 2018 12%
